entries.title: SDK Documentation - Introduction
SDK Documentation - SDK Introduction
entries.content: The Mendix SDKs consist of Mendix Platform SDK and Mendix Model SDK. Before diving right into the details of SDKs, you can start with the SDK Introduction.

entries.title: SDK Documentation - SDK Use Cases
entries.content: The Use Case Examples provide examples from the four basic categories of actions performed with the Mendix SDK: analyzing, exporting, modifying and importing.

entries.title: SDK Documentation - SDK FAQ and Troubleshooting
entries.content:
This document provides the FAQs and troubleshooting information for common error messages.

If you need help with the SDKs, check whether your question is answered in the SDK FAQ. Otherwise, ask your question in the Mendix Community.

entries.title: SDK Documentation - SDK Reference Guide
entries.content:
Browse the reference documentation below about the Mendix Metamodel:

Mendix Metamodel – explains the basic components of the Mendix Metamodel as well as the domain model, microflows, pages, and apps in the Mendix Metamodel
JavaScript & TypeScript Resources – summarizes TypeScript and provides links to useful resources for learning more

entries.title: SDK Documentation - SDK How-tos
SDK Documentation - Feedback
entries.content:
Was this page helpful?

Glad to hear it! Thank you for your response.
